creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: very similar to 2004.67.369 and 2004.67.371; red, green, blue, pink; royal blue satin base completely covered with appliqued scroll designs using multicolored sequins; small, round pink braid in curly designs; lots of yellow metal outlining; "horns" and crown-like shape in front; back tapers down to a point (helmet shape?); stiff overall; cloth chin strap; quilted lining
title: Child's Hat
